name: Site Mapper
description: Crawl a website and build a structured content map with page summaries.
prompt:
# Site Mapper

Crawl a website and build a structured content map.

## Instructions

1. Check Scrapling availability with `scraping_status`
2. Start with the root URL: {{url}}
3. Use `scrape_page` with `extract_links: true` to discover all internal links
4. Filter links to same domain only
5. Use `scrape_multiple` to batch-scrape discovered pages (up to 20)
6. For each page, extract:
   - Page title
   - Main heading (h1)
   - Brief content summary (first 200 chars)
   - Outgoing internal links
7. Build a hierarchical site map

## Output Format

Present as a structured site map:

```

â”œâ”€â”€ / (Homepage) - Brief description

â”‚   â””â”€â”€ /contact - Contact information
â””â”€â”€ Total: X pages discovered
```

Include a summary table with page count, content types found, and any notable patterns.
